ref.full: Shiflett, M. B.; Niehaus, A. M. S.; Yokozeki, A. (2009) J. Chem. Eng. Data 54(7), 2090-2094.
ref.title: Liquid-Liquid Equilibria in Binary Mixtures Containing Chlorobenzene, Bromobenzene, and Iodobenzene with Ionic Liquid 1-Ethyl-3-methylimidazolim Bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide
